EmailTemplate.name: NA_Commercial_Manufacturing_Cold_Nurture.Manufacturing_Cold_Nurture_Commercial_E
EmailTemplate.subject: Need to deliver the cloud? Here’s how EDF Renewable Energy made it happen
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/turbonomic-customer-success-story-edf-re-delivering-cloud/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Reluctant to adopt workload automation in your environment? We get it. One of our customers, Matt McColm of EDF Renewable Energy felt the same. This is his story.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/turbonomic-customer-success-story-edf-re-delivering-cloud/]]>
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/turbonomic-customer-success-story-edf-re-delivering-cloud/]]> With Turbonomic, EDF RE is able to deliver on-prem and in the public cloud. Want to learn more? See how over 1,900 of our customers <[[https://turbonomic.com/customers/customers-by-industry/]]> leverage workload automation to simultaneously optimize performance, cost and policy compliance in real-time.
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
